title: Pork belly with parsley sauce and lovage potatoes
description: Need a speedy Sunday lunch? This recipe is fuss-free and a few simple tricks ensure its full of flavour.
ingredients: 800g/1lb 12oz new potatoes, peeled and kept whole
8 slices belly pork (about 1kg/2lb 4oz weight in total), each slice about 1cm/½in thick
